sentence.Network_en: In this paper , drying properties of dendrocalamus giganteus were studied using microwave drying.
sentence.Network_cn: 对龙竹竹材在微波干燥下的干燥特性进行了研究.

sentence.Network_en: Temperature distribution was tested along thickness direction of Dendrocalamus giganteus timber under different hot pressing temperatures.
sentence.Network_cn: 测定了龙竹竹材在不同热压温度下干燥时的温度分布.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 对牡竹属(Dendrocalamus)3个竹笋品质佳的竹种[勃氏甜龙竹(D.brandisii)、马来麻竹(D.asper)、花吊丝竹(D.minor vat.amoenus)]的竹 …
有些竹类的地下茎明显较竹秆肥大，例如麻竹属（Dendrocalamus）、蓬莱竹属（Bambusa）等；有些则仅稍肥大或不肥大而与竹秆 …
